rules_text:
Blockbuster 3 [i](As an additional cost to cast this spell, you may tap three untapped non-Aura permanents you control. If you do, this spell is a blockbuster.)[/i]
Choose one. If this spell is a blockbuster, you may choose both instead.
• Create two 1/1 white Soldier creature tokens.
• Put a +1/+1 counter on each of up to two target creatures you control.
